M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Driver.driver
Main method of program, it calls the first menu and the program finishes when it is done
make() - Static method in class Question.Essay
A standard way to make questions, only requires the user input a String
make() - Static method in class Question.Matching
This is the polymorphic make call that prompts the user to create a matching question
make() - Static method in class Question.MultiChoice
Polymorphic way to make Multiple Choice question.
make() - Static method in class Question.Ranking
Polymorphic make for ranking, does not require a question.
make() - Static method in class Question.ShortAnswer
Polymorphic make, guides user through making a Short Answer
make() - Static method in class Question.True_False
Polymorphic make to create a T/F question
MakeAdmin() - Method in class User.Users
 
MakeNewSurvey() - Method in class Assessment.Survey
Asks user to name the survey and calls a menu to make all of the questions
MakeNewTest() - Method in class Assessment.Test
This makes a new test, asks the user for a title and calls a menu of questions
MakeQuestions() - Static method in class Question.Question
This method is the second menu that creates the questions that are needed in Assessments.
Matching - Class in Question
 
Matching() - Constructor for class Question.Matching
Matching is a muli answer question that is correct out of order
Matching(String[], ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class Question.Matching
Matching without a question will default to a generic "Match" question
Matching(String, String[], ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class Question.Matching
Matching takes a question, the options, and the answers
menu1() - Static method in class Driver.driver
The menu makes a empty test and survey to guard against viewing an empty assessment and then allows the user to choose from a menu
MenuSelect(ArrayList<String>) - Method in class Interface.Input
This function takes a list of menu options and display the menu
modify() - Method in class Assessment.Assessment
Allows a survey or test to be completely modified
modify() - Method in class Question.Essay
 
modify() - Method in class Question.Matching
 
modify() - Method in class Question.MultiChoice
 
modify() - Method in class Question.Question
 
modify() - Method in class Question.Ranking
 
modify() - Method in class Question.ShortAnswer
 
modify() - Method in class Question.True_False
 
MultiChoice - Class in Question
 
MultiChoice() - Constructor for class Question.MultiChoice
Multiple Choice can be correct in any order, null constructor makes without question, options, answers
MultiChoice(String, String[], ArrayList<String>) - Constructor for class Question.MultiChoice
Multiple Choice is made from a question, options, and a String of answer(s)
MultipleAnswer - Class in Question
 
MultipleAnswer() - Constructor for class Question.MultipleAnswer
MultiAnswer is an abstract class that can have multi answers as responses to its questions and it is gradeable
MultipleAnswer(String, String[], ArrayList<String>, boolean) - Constructor for class Question.MultipleAnswer
This constuctor takes super calls and passes them off to super, allows question to be gradeable
